title: Republicans face 'Dark Money' campaign attacks in Montana
description: Filmmaker Kimberly Reed talks about her new documentary, "Dark Money," in which she shows how the Citizens United decision impacts Republicans in Montana.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
